description.value: Your additives contain panaceas that can remedy a plethora of maladies. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Merciful Elixir]{Merciful Elixir}, your elixir can instead attempt to counteract the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed} condition.
